mapper.insert: UPDATE USERS SET I_NO = INSTRUCTOR_SEQ.NEXTVAL WHERE U_NO = #{u_no}
mapper.select: SELECT U_NO, EMAIL, PASSWORD, NICKNAME, IMG, I_NO FROM USERS WHERE EMAIL=#{email} AND PASSWORD=#{password}

SELECT l.title title, l.img img, c.url url, ROUND((SELECT count(*) FROM FINISH WHERE 1 = 1 AND U_NO = #{u_no} AND L_NO = #{l_no}) * 100 / (SELECT count(*) FROM CURRICULUM WHERE L_NO = #{l_no}),2) progress, f.finish_time finishTime FROM LECTURE l, FINISH f, CURRICULUM c WHERE l.l_no = c.l_no AND c.c_no = f.c_no AND F.U_NO = #{u_no} AND F.L_NO = #{l_no} group by l.title, l.img, c.url, f.finish_time
